sections.heading: power and irrigation district funds; deposits; limitation
sections.text: The deposits secured by a surety bond shall at no time exceed the amount of the penal sum of such surety bond.SourceLaws 1941, c. 160, ยง 2, p. 642;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 77-2538;R.S.1943, ยง 77-2356;Laws 1996, LB 1274, ยง 45.
